He differentiates between earned income (what one works for) and passive or portfolio income (what works for you). The author also encourages readers to utilize their minds and time wisely, suggesting that smart spending on education and assets can lead to wealth.
takeaways: Understand the difference between earned income and passive/portfolio income, aiming to shift your focus towards the latter for financial freedom.
Utilize each dollar bill wisely by investing in learning and acquiring assets.
quote: Every day with every dollar you decide to be rich, poor or middle class. The choice is yours and only yours.
